text: If you pass a nifti with data that does not allow for signs, a `TypeError` is returned. This explains the crash, but is why should there be no perfect xyz cuts just because the content of the nifti image cannot be negative?
title: nilearn.plotting.find_xyz_cut_coords() does not support unsigned integer 16/32/64 niftis
clean_text: If pass nifti data allow sign return thi explain crash perfect xyz cut content nifti imag cannot neg
